payors.name: Cigna

network_paths.label: Cigna DPPO Direct
network_paths.notes: Standard direct contract. Applies to most employer-sponsored DPPO plans.

network_paths.label: Cigna via Careington
network_paths.notes: Careington leases to Cigna DPPO. Triggers when practice has Careington contract but no direct Cigna contract, OR when Careington rate is lower and contract allows override.

network_paths.label: Cigna via Connection Dental
network_paths.notes: Federal employee plans (FEDVIP) may route through Connection Dental.

routing_rules: Direct contract is primary for commercial DPPO if practice has it
Careington path fires for federal/government plans when Connection Dental not present
Check plan ID prefix: DPPO vs DHMO vs FEDVIP — each routes differently

payors.name: UnitedHealthcare

network_paths.label: UHC Dental PPO Direct
network_paths.notes: Standard UHC Dental PPO. Practice must have direct UHC Dental contract.

network_paths.label: UHC via Careington
network_paths.notes: UHC accesses Careington network for many employer group plans. This is a major silent PPO risk — practice may not realize UHC is repricing via Careington rates.

network_paths.label: UHC MAC (Maximum Allowable Charge)
network_paths.notes: Some UHC plans use MAC pricing — not network-based but still discounted.

routing_rules: CRITICAL: UHC is one of the most common silent PPO offenders — always verify which path a UHC claim takes
Plan name containing 'Select' or 'Core' more likely to route via Careington
Large employer groups more likely to have direct UHC contract
Individual/marketplace plans most likely direct

payors.name: MetLife

network_paths.label: MetLife Standard PDP (Direct)
network_paths.notes: Standard MetLife PDP contract. Direct negotiated rates. Most employer-sponsored MetLife plans.

network_paths.label: MetLife PDP Plus via Careington
network_paths.notes: CRITICAL: Careington only accesses MetLife PDP Plus — NOT standard PDP. If practice only has Careington contract (no direct MetLife), PDP Plus patients are accessible but standard PDP patients are out-of-network.

network_paths.label: MetLife FEDVIP via Careington
network_paths.notes: Federal employee MetLife dental plans route via Careington.

routing_rules: CRITICAL RULE: Careington = PDP Plus + FEDVIP ONLY. Standard PDP requires direct MetLife contract.
Always identify plan type before assuming Careington covers MetLife patients
PDP Plus patients: if practice has Careington but not direct MetLife, they ARE in-network
Standard PDP patients: if practice has Careington but not direct MetLife, they are OUT-of-network

payors.name: Aetna

network_paths.label: Aetna PPO Direct
network_paths.notes: Aetna operates mostly direct — does not commonly lease to major umbrella networks. Direct contract is primary path.

network_paths.label: Aetna via Connection Dental
network_paths.notes: Limited Aetna FEDVIP plans may access Connection Dental.

network_paths.label: Aetna DMO (DHMO)
network_paths.notes: Closed panel — requires separate DMO credentialing. Not leased.

routing_rules: Aetna is relatively clean — mostly direct contracting
Verify FEDVIP separately — may access Connection Dental
DMO plans always direct — separate credentialing required

payors.name: Delta Dental

network_paths.label: Delta Dental PPO (Direct)
network_paths.notes: Delta Dental PPO — negotiated reduced rates. Most common Delta plan.

network_paths.label: Delta Dental Premier (Direct)
network_paths.notes: Delta Premier — higher rates than PPO, broader acceptance. Practice accepts UCR limited to Premier fee schedule.

network_paths.label: Delta Dental DHMO / DeltaCare USA
network_paths.notes: Closed panel DHMO. Separate credentialing.

routing_rules: Delta Dental does NOT participate in umbrella network leasing — always direct
Premier vs PPO determination critical: Premier patients using PPO-only providers pay more OOP
Delta networks are state-specific — Delta of CA is separate entity from Delta of NY
PPO patients at Premier-only providers treated as out-of-network for PPO benefits

payors.name: Humana

network_paths.label: Humana Direct (Loyalty Plus / Complete Care)
network_paths.notes: Direct Humana contract. Loyalty Plus and Complete Care are the primary direct plan types.

network_paths.label: Humana via Zelis/Maverest
network_paths.notes: Humana leases heavily through Zelis/Maverest network. Many Humana plans reprice through Zelis. This is a major leased network path — practice may not realize Zelis is repricing.

network_paths.label: Humana via Careington (via Zelis sub-lease)
network_paths.notes: Some Humana plans access Careington providers through a Zelis sub-lease arrangement.

routing_rules: Humana is one of the heaviest umbrella network users — assume leased path until proven otherwise
Zelis is the primary Humana leasing conduit
Check plan name carefully: Loyalty Plus = more likely direct; CompDent = more likely Zelis

payors.name: Guardian

network_paths.label: Guardian DentalGuard Direct
network_paths.notes: Standard direct Guardian contract. DentalGuard Preferred is the main employer plan.

network_paths.label: Guardian via Careington
network_paths.notes: Some Guardian plans access Careington network, particularly in markets where Guardian network density is low.

network_paths.label: Guardian via DenteMax
network_paths.notes: Some voluntary Guardian plans may access DenteMax.

routing_rules: Guardian is moderately complex — direct is most common but Careington leasing is real
Verify by calling Guardian for specific group numbers if uncertain

payors.name: Anthem / BCBS

network_paths.label: Anthem/BCBS Direct
network_paths.notes: Standard direct Anthem/BCBS contract.

network_paths.label: Anthem via Careington
network_paths.notes: Anthem accesses Careington in some state markets. State-specific — not all BCBS plans participate.

network_paths.label: BCBS via DNOA
network_paths.notes: BCBS plans in TX, IL, NM, Kansas City, OK, MT route through DNOA (Dental Network of America, owned by HCSC).
network_paths.geographic_restriction: TX, IL, NM, Kansas City MO, OK, MT only

routing_rules: BCBS is highly state-specific — a BCBS plan in Texas routes completely differently than New York
HCSC states (TX, IL, NM, OK, MT) = DNOA path
Anthem states = may have Careington access
Always identify which BCBS entity issued the plan — each is independent

payors.name: Principal

network_paths.label: Principal Dental Direct
network_paths.notes: Direct Principal contract.

network_paths.label: Principal via Zelis
network_paths.notes: Principal uses Zelis/Maverest for network access in many markets.

network_paths.label: Principal via Careington
network_paths.notes: Some Principal plans access Careington network.

routing_rules: Principal is a moderately complex leaser — Zelis is the primary path after direct

payors.name: Beam Dental

network_paths.label: Beam via DenteMax
network_paths.notes: Beam Dental operates almost entirely through DenteMax network. Practice must have DenteMax contract to be in-network for Beam.

network_paths.label: Beam Direct
network_paths.notes: Limited direct contracting in some markets.

routing_rules: Beam = DenteMax. Full stop in most cases.
Practice without DenteMax contract is effectively out-of-network for Beam

payors.name: Renaissance Dental

network_paths.label: Renaissance via DenteMax
network_paths.notes: Renaissance primarily operates through DenteMax.

routing_rules: Renaissance = DenteMax in most cases

payors.name: Mutual of Omaha

network_paths.label: Mutual of Omaha via DenteMax
network_paths.notes: Mutual of Omaha dental primarily routes through DenteMax.

network_paths.label: Mutual of Omaha Direct
network_paths.notes: Some direct contracting.

routing_rules: DenteMax is the primary path for Mutual of Omaha dental

payors.name: Unum

network_paths.label: Unum via DenteMax
network_paths.notes: Unum dental is almost entirely DenteMax.

routing_rules: Unum = DenteMax

payors.name: Colonial Life

network_paths.label: Colonial Life via DenteMax
network_paths.notes: Colonial Life dental routes primarily through DenteMax.

routing_rules: Colonial Life = DenteMax

payors.name: Sun Life Financial

network_paths.label: Sun Life via Careington
network_paths.notes: Sun Life accesses Careington in many markets.

network_paths.label: Sun Life Direct
network_paths.notes: Direct Sun Life contracting where available.

routing_rules: Sun Life uses Careington frequently — verify by market

payors.name: GEHA

network_paths.label: GEHA via Connection Dental
network_paths.notes: GEHA owns Connection Dental — their plans exclusively route through Connection Dental network.

routing_rules: GEHA = Connection Dental. Always.
Federal employee plan — practice must be credentialed with Connection Dental
